cves.description: Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled SQL Primary Key, CWE - 89 - Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Logo Software Diva allows SQL Injection, CAPEC - 7 - Blind SQL Injection.This issue affects Diva: through 4.56.00.00.
problemType: CWE-566 Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled SQL Primary Key
CWE - 89 - Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
